name: Save The Academy [Stable/Incomplete]
description:
Game developed using Maplestory (BannedStory) sprites [DISCLAIMER, I do not own any of the sprites].

Includes a story sequence that has scenes, voice acting, and character introductions. (TheAct1.exe). It's recommended to watch first before playing.

The gameplay involves using your abilities and skill tree to level up certain skills to use them. The "Buffs" of the game is disabled due to a bug, so be aware it won't do anything.

The interface was designed heavily which is most definitely the proudest thing about this game. I would certainly like to finish this game up, but... the voice actors a long gone considering this was made hundreds of years ago.

[Controls]

TheAct1.exe : Space bar to continue the text

Tutorial1.exe : Z to attack, X to double jump (if learned skill)

A, S, D to use skills (if learned skill)

Q, W to use buffs (if learned skill)

Up,Down,Left,Right to move.
